programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Uma Aventura Selvagem, (2021, Adventure)

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Drama)

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls, (1955, Musical)
programme.desc: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: Paris Blues, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: Ram (Paul Newman) and Eddie (Sidney Poitier) are two expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris, where their music is celebrated. When they fall in love with two vacationing American girls, they must decide if they should move back to America with them.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Lilies Of The Field, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: Artists and Models, (1955, Screwball)
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: The April Fools, (1969, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Howard Brubaker (Jack Lemmon) is a newly promoted man trapped in a loveless marriage. Catherine's (Catherine Deneuve) marriage would be ideal if her husband wasn't a womanizer. Soon the pair find themselves falling in love, and facing their spouses.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, Jason Statham is a mechanican elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. Simon West (CON AIR) directs this hit remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson movie.

programme.title: Best of the Best, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Eric Roberts, Philip Rhee, Christopher Penn, John Dye and David Agresta play five men who are selected as members of the U.S. National Karate Team. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Warrior, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: London Has Fallen, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, Jason Statham is a mechanican elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. Simon West (CON AIR) directs this hit remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson movie.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow, (2020, Werewolves)
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff and his lackluster team of officers must solve a series of brutal murders that are occurring on the full moon. As he's consumed by the hunt for the killer, he struggles to remind himself that there's no such thing as werewolves

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Heather Mason and her father have always tried to stay one step ahead of the malevolent forces intent on their destruction. But on the eve of her 18th birthday, a dangerous revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world.

programme.title: X, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A group of actors set out to make an adult film in rural Texas under the noses of their reclusive hosts, but when the elderly couple catches their young guests in the act, the cast finds themselves in a desperate fight for their lives.

programme.title: Pearl: An X-traordinary Origin Story, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Trapped on her family's isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under the bitter, overbearing watch of her devout mother. Lusting for the glamorous life she's seen in the movies, Pearl's temptations and repressions collide.

programme.title: Studio 666, (2022, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: In Studio 666, the legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the roombut when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: Feast, (2005, Monsters)
programme.desc: Customers locked inside a bar are forced to fight monsters.

programme.title: A Message from Brianna, (2021, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: A Message from Brianna

programme.title: Jessabelle, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Jotaro Kujo! Meets Josuke Higashikata
programme.desc: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Josuke Higashikata! Meets Angelo
programme.desc: Josuke informs Jotaro about his encounter with Angelos Stand. Deducing that the serial killers Stand is capable of entering peoples bodies, Jotaro tells Josuke over the phone to stay on high alert until he arrives at his home.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Jotaro learn that a man with a bow and arrow was responsible for awakening Angelos Stand ability. Realizing the town is still in danger, they decide to find the bow and arrow before it can create any more victims.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the Nijimura Brothers house to rescue Koichi, who is in critical condition after getting shot by Keicho Nijimuras bow and arrow. But when Josuke steps into the house, he is attacked by Keichos Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
programme.desc: After defeating Keicho, Koichi insists they find the bow and arrow and destroy it. Josuke agrees, but when the two enter the attic where the bow and arrow are being kept, they hear an inhuman noise inside.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilty for his actions when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Toshikazu Hazamada (Show Off)
programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamadas wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi is both surprised and excited when a girl named Yukako Yamagishi says she likes him. But Koichis joy quickly turns into fear after Yukako begins to express her love for him in very erratic and dangerous ways.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua faces Shoot while Gon takes on Knuckle.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Three Royal Guards kneel down to respectfully welcome the Chimera Ant King, but by doing so they signal the end of their allegiance to the Queen.
programme.sub-title: The Strong x And X The Weak

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Colt surrenders and seeks the help of the extermination team to help the dying Queen.
programme.sub-title: One Wish x And x Two Promises

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: After losing to Knuckle and Shoot, Gon and Killua return home to Palm.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: While Gon is on his date with Palm, Killua encounters Rammot in the forest. Just when their battle is about to begin, Killua hears his brother's voice in his head, telling him to run away.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Morel appear to be overwhelmed by the speed of Cheetu's attacks, but they have a chance at victory.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kalluto, Feitan, Shalnark, Phinks, Shizuku, and Bonolenov meet in Meteor City, the home of the Phantom Troupe. They have returned after getting the news that the Chimera Ant, Zazan, has built her nest in their city.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The members of the Phantom Troupe go to Zazan's nest to defeat her. The Troupe splits up to confront Zazan's minions individually. As they battle, each member of the Troupe reveals their secret ability.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: A pair of Chimera Ants appears and hunts Gon under the cover of night, overwhelming him with their attacks. Feeling that things are at a standstill, he gathers up his Nen and prepares to throw a punch.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Game Master
programme.desc: Bullets fly and Hamon reverberates as brassy Joseph battles the Hamon master-turned-vampire Straizo. Later, an ominous revelation pulls Joseph to Mexico.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Pillar Man
programme.desc: In search of the mysterious Pillar Man, Joseph arrives in Mexico to promising news but deadly resistance. Now the German armys thirst for power may have awakened an unstoppable powereven for Joseph.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: JoJo vs. The Ultimate Lifeform
programme.desc: Trading blows with Santviento, Joseph employs his usual wit, but the jokes fall as flat as the Hamon. Stroheim surprises as he sheds light on the lethal Pillar Men, leaving Joseph hanging in more ways than one.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Ultimate Warriors from Ancient Times
programme.desc: Joseph and Speedwagon travel to Rome to meet another Hamon wielder, Caesar Zeppeli, who takes them to the enigmatic Pillar Men. While Joseph and Caesar clash, they arrive to find a grim awakening.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: A Hero's Proof
programme.desc: Caesar confronts Wamuu and the other Pillar Men, but falters, clearing the way for Joseph. But anxiety replaces audacity as Josephs plan invites a presumable death sentence.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: In mysterious Venice, Joseph and Caesar begin training under the equally enigmatic Lisa Lisa. Let the Hamon hell begin!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Under Lisa Lisas tutelage, Joseph and Caesar must endure their final test. But while Caesar hones his skills, Joseph is stunned by an ancient and unexpected foe.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Joseph returns to Lisa Lisa, unaware of the bizarre stowaway he has delivered. A possessed confidant then attacks, ultimately sending the crew to Switzerland, where another revelation awaits.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: A Race Toward the Brink
programme.desc: Stroheim is back from the brink, now as a cyborg designed to secure the great Red Stone. Kars, however, is not willing to concede and wages war, even as the stone hurtles toward an alpine cliff.

programme.desc: Officer Cole is assigned to infiltrate the syndicate of God, a deadly crime lord. But as Cole sinks deeper into God's crew, he begins to get in over his head, until the line that separates his true identity from his street persona begins to disappear.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)

programme.title: Marshall, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: About a young Thurgood Marshall, the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: A.K.A. Cassius Clay, (1970, Documentary)

programme.desc: One black and one white woman in 1955 Montgomery, Alabama must decide what they are going to do in response to the famous bus boycott lead by Martin Luther King. With Whoopi Goldberg and Sissy Spacek.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: Enter the Ninja, (1981, Action)

programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: To his family and friends, Cody Banks is a typical teen. But Cody has a secret - he's actually part of an undercover teen CIA program and has 5 years of special training under his belt.

programme.desc: Traveling to London, Agent Cody Banks attends a prestigious school where he gets close to a man who is working with his arch villain Molay.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker, (2006, Action)

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Screwball)

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Screwball)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: Blades of Glory, (2007, Comedy)

programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Screwball)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Comedy)

programme.title: Blue Velvet, (1986, Thriller)

programme.title: Jade, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Corelli is up to his neck in a case that may lead where he doesn't want to go. Chazz Palminteri portrays Matt, an attorney and Corelli's longtime pal. Linda Fiorentino is Matt's wife Trina: a psychologist who's capable of anything, even murder.

programme.title: Showgirls, (1995, Drama)

programme.desc: The filmization of Tom Stoppard's immensely witty Shakespearean spin-off, which changes the tone of Hamlet from a tragedy to a Comedy.

programme.title: F/X 2, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Over the Top, (1987, Adventure)

programme.title: Mandy, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When a cult attacks, the shocking assault leads to vengeance.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Terrifier, (2018, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.title: Hush, (2016, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Horns, (2014, Fantasy)

programme.title: The Woman in Red, (1984, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Throw Momma From the Train, (1987, Comedy)

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Adventure)

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Action)

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Lawless, (2012, Drama)

programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.desc: All gangster Tommy Spinelli wants to do is deliver his carry-on duffel bag to his boss. Unfortunately, the bag is switched with a Mexican-bound medical student...who has no idea that the bag contains the severed heads of eight Los Angeles gangsters!

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)

programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.desc: In the summer of 1969, Pearl (Diane Lane) meets a free-spirited, sexy stranger (Viggo Mortensen), while on yet another tedious vacation with her husband. She is soon doing the unthinkable: having a daring, passionate affair.

programme.title: Roman Holiday, (1953, Romance)
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: Bogie and Holden are the mega-rich Larrabee brothers of Long Island. Bogies all work, Holdens all playboy. But when Sabrina (Hepburn), daughter of the familys chauffeur, returns from Paris, the stage is set for some family fireworks.

programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: Paris When It Sizzles, (1964, Romance)

programme.desc: Ben is trying to get to Savannah for his wedding. A seagull flies into the engine as his plane is taking off. All later flights are canceled because of an approaching hurricane, so he hitches a ride in with an attractive woman named Sara.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)

programme.desc: A spiteful loser finds his true calling when he opens a highly successful business specializing in revenge.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: Who'll Stop The Rain?, (1978, Drama)
programme.desc: In this gripping thriller, Vietnam vet Ray Hicks (Nick Nolte) smuggles heroin back to the States for his pal John, but when Ray and Johns wife (Tuesday Weld) deliver the drugs, they are ambushed. Now on the run, they must find a way to survive!

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: The Changeling, (1980, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A Manhattan composer moves to a secluded Victorian mansion when he is consumed by grief after his wife and daughter are killed in a shocking accident.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS DEFEATED?! HORDY GAINS CONTROL OF THE RYUGU PALACE!

programme.title: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they're no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE HAUNTING TIES! NAMI AND THE FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A HERO WHO FREED THE SLAVES! AN ADVENTURER TIGER!

programme.title: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime's fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KIZARU APPEARS! A TRAP TO CATCH TIGER!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen's mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SUDDEN TRAGEDY! A GUNSHOT SHUTS DOWN THE FUTURE!

programme.title: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO THE PRESENT! HORDY MAKES A MOVE!

programme.title: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KINGDOM IN SHOCK! AN ORDER TO EXECUTE NEPTUNE ISSUED!

programme.title: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy's uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out-of-body experience with hopes of saving his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A RIFT OPENS UP! LUFFY VS. JIMBEI!

programme.title: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED TO HORDY! THE TRUE POWER OF THE EVIL DRUG!

programme.title: Hordy's rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! AT CONCHCORDE PLAZA!

programme.title: Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING CONFESSION! THE TRUTH BEHIND THE ASSASSINATION OF OTOHIME!

programme.title: Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother's murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHIRAHOSHI'S TEARS! LUFFY FINALLY SHOWS UP!

programme.title: Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BIG CLASH! THE STRAW HATS VS. A HUNDRED THOUSAND ENEMIES!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang show off how much stronger they've become by issuing a brutal beat down to Hordy and his ferocious Fish-Man Pirates! Can anything stop the Hats?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY ATTACKS ONE AFTER ANOTHER! ZORO AND SANJI JOIN THE BATTLE!

programme.title: Hordy's men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNVEILED! THE SECRET WEAPONS OF THE SUNNY!

programme.title: Franky dazzles Usopp and Chopper by transforming into a gigantic fighting robot, Hordy tries to blackmail the Kraken, and Luffy introduces his fist to the Fish-man's face!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IRON PIRATE! HERE COMES GENERAL FRANKY!

programme.title: Luffy shows off even more new powers as he brutally pummels Hordy, but the main attraction proves to be an ancient and immense pirate ship that's heading straight for Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NOAH CLOSING IN! THE FISHMAN ISLAND FACING DESTRUCTION!

programme.title: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy's devious nature fully comes to the surface.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY UP, LUFFY! SHIRAHOSHI'S LIFE IN JEOPARDY!

programme.title: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami's honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIERCE FIGHT BEGINS! LUFFY VS. HORDY!

programme.title: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MASSIVE CONFUSED FIGHT! THE STRAW HATS VS. THE NEW FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he'll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi's big brother risks his own life in a heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY LOSES THE FIGHT?! HORDY'S LONG-AWAITED REVENGE!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy's hatred for humans is finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SHOCKING FACT! THE TRUE IDENTITY OF HORDY!

programme.title: Hordy's twisted past takes center stage in a Fish-Man flashback. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi's brother begs Luffy to save his beloved homeland and wipe out the anti-human element!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO ZERO! EARNEST WISHES FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Luffy's fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S ALL-OUT ATTACK! RED HAWK BLASTS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of their enemies, Luffy summons the strength for one last brutal attack on Hordy. Now, about that giant boat
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COMING TO AN END! THE FINAL DECISIVE BATTLE AGAINST HORDY!

programme.title: After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE FUTURE! THE PATH TO THE SUN!

programme.title: Jimbei must decide whether or not to join the Straw Hats, and the grateful citizens of Fish-Man Island host a fabulous banquet in honor of their human heroes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET REVEALED! THE TRUTH ABOUT THE ANCIENT WEAPON!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew learn of epic battle between Aokiji and Akainu, a forgotten foe tries to kidnap the mermaid princess, and Hordy's gang finally gets what's coming to them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS STUNNED! THE NEW FLEET ADMIRAL OF THE NAVY!

programme.title: Outlander, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A man from another world crash lands on Earth during the age of the Vikings.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Adventure)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Last Of The Pony Riders, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tries to set up a stage line to carry government mail. Schemers try to get the government assignment for their own stage line, and plan to discredit the Pony Express by causing accidents.

programme.title: On Top Of Old Smoky, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry, who is mistaken for a Texas Ranger, helps the owner of a toll road, while she is being pressured by bad characters to relinquish her property, which contains valuable mica deposits.

programme.title: Pack Train, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry sets out to aid frontier settlers, threatened by a shortage of food and medicine. When storekeepers divert the supplies to gold miners, Gene and Smiley Burnette must ride to the rescue.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land barron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Fanboys, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of 'The Phantom Menace,' so that their terminally ill friend can see it before its release in theaters several months down the line.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Desperate to revive his career, Dickie tries to audition for a role in Rob Reiner's new movie but the director doesn't believe Dickie is normal enough to play the part.

programme.title: The Station Agent, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: A loner with a passion for trains inherits an empty train station in the middle of nowhere. He encounters unexpected neighbors and with absolutely nothing in common, they form a friendship none of them could foresee.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Comic icon Steve Martin steps into the shoes of the late Peter Sellers and wonderfully reprises the role of the bumbling, world famous Inspector Jacques Clouseau in this remake of Blake Edwards comedy classic, The Pink Panther.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Motokis little sister Unazuki is a pure-hearted girl who dreams of sharing her first kiss with the person she truly loves.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Pure Heart: The Three-Way Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small misunderstanding causes Umino and Naru to believe that the other is no longer interested in them.
programme.sub-title: Let Moon Help with Your Love Problems

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite sets her eyes on Ami, believing that the famous girl genius would possess a pure heart full of confidence.
programme.sub-title: The Labyrinth of Water: Ami Targeted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Realizing that the two mysterious Sailor Guardians Uranus and Neptune are also after the talismans, Kaolinite sends a Daimon to get rid of them.
programme.sub-title: To Save Our Friends: Moon and Uranus Join Forces

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reis been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares shes been having.
programme.sub-title: A Man's Kindness: Yuichiro Heartbroken by Rei

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.
programme.sub-title: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian: Minako's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite is confident that she has finally found a person possessing the talisman. Aided by a Daimon, Kaolinate goes after her next target: Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi in Tears: A Glass Slipper for My Birthday

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taking Tuxedo Mask as a hostage, Kaolinite tells Usagi and the Sailor Guardians to come to the top of Tokyo Tower for their final showdown.
programme.sub-title: The Stolen Pure Heart: Usagi's Crisis

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following Kaolinites death, Eudial takes over and begins searching for the talismans. Her first target is Maya, a world-renowned Taiko drummer.
programme.sub-title: The Arrival of a Small Pretty Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa has returned from the future to complete her training as a Sailor Guardian. She is to learn how to make friends in the twentieth century.
programme.sub-title: Making New Friends: Chibi Moon's Adventure

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After experiencing a humiliating defeat by a Daimon, Makoto decides to retrain herself in the mountains.
programme.sub-title: I Want Power: Mako Lost in Doubt

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls are taking a tour at one of the high schools they plan to apply to next year.
programme.sub-title: The Bond of Destiny: Uranus's Distant Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is stunned at the sight of Usagi and the others enjoying a pie since she actually made the pie for Masanori, the boy she has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Art Is an Explosion of Love: Chibi-Usa's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru and the girls receive an invitation to a party hosted by Edwards, an Englishman who lives alone on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako realizes that she is the only Sailor Guardian who has not been targeted by a Daimon.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Moment: Everyone's Identities Revealed

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Michiru and Haruka sense that soon they will find the talismans.
programme.sub-title: The Death of Uranus and Neptune: The Talisman Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune are revealed to be the ones possessing the talismans. The Sailor Guardians go after Eudial, who is on the run with their talismans.
programme.sub-title: The Holy Grail's Mystical Power: Moon's Double Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mimete takes over for Eudial to gather the pure hearts to awaken the Messiah of Silence. Mimete sets as her target Yosaku Eda, a popular actor.
programme.sub-title: Who Is the True Messiah? Chaos of Light and Darkness

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is very intrigued when she hears Chibi-Usa is going to a 'friends' house to play.
programme.sub-title: A House Filled with Evil Presence: The Beautiful Hotaru's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Mimete enter a movie audition where the winner gets to costar with the idol Jinta Araki. Both girls are eager to win the role.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Guardians of the Outer Solar System sense something dangerous lurking inside Hotaru Tomoe's personality.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Silence: The Pale Glimmer of a Firefly

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru tries to avoid Chibi-Usa out of fear that her other personality will bring harm. Undaunted, Chibi-Usa invites Hotaru to go on a picnic.
programme.sub-title: Sunny Skies After a Storm: A Friendship Dedicated to Hotaru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shun Hayase is a high school athlete who sets a new national record in the men's high jump after overcoming health issues as a child.
programme.sub-title: Higher and Stronger: A Cheer from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A freak accident caused by Mimete results in Hotaru's house getting pulled into a dimensional rift, with Hotaru and Chibi-Usa trapped inside.
programme.sub-title: Battle Inside the Demonic Space: The Sailor Guardians' Gamble

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete attacks with Daimon u Choten.
programme.sub-title: The Messiah of Silence Awakens? Stars of Destiny

programme.title: 2020. Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi - T01E18

programme.title: 2020. Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve - T01E19

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin - T01E20

programme.title: 2020. Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura so escolhidos para fazer a Prova Chunin. Iruka se ope participao dos trs, pois os considera muito novos e inexperientes para o desafio. Kakashi, porm, acredita que eles cresceram e esto mais prontos do que nunca. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Identifique-Se : Novos E Poderosos Rivais - T01E21

programme.title: 2020. Enquanto Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se preparam para a prova, um ninja chamado Rock Lee aparece. Lee quer lutar contra Sasuke, que possui o poder do cl Uchiha. Sasuke aceita o desafio de Lee, mas fica s na defesa devido aos ataques rpidos desse oponente. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke - T01E22

programme.title: 2020. Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se inscrevem oficialmente para a Prova Chunin e formam um time. Para passar, nenhum membro pode falhar. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam - T01E23

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe iniciam a primeira prova. O examinador Ibiki Morino, um jonin (ninja de alto nvel) notrio e perito em interrograo. Sasuke e Sakura esto preocupados, pois se Naruto responder tudo errado, eles tambm falharo. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea
programme.desc: Naruto: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea - T01E24

programme.title: 2020. A parte mais difcil da prova comea na pergunta 10. Antes dos ninjas escutarem a pergunta, Ibiki coloca uma regra injusta para o problema: quem responder errado ser reprovado e no ter o direito de fazer qualquer Prova Chunin no futuro. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada - T01E25

programme.title: 2020. Konohamaru, neto do Terceiro Hokage da Aldeia da Folha, aparece durante a Prova Chunin com Moegi e Udon e cobre eventos para o jornal da Academia Ninja. Ele v Naruto como um irmo mais velho e, entrevistando os personagens, reconta suas aventuras. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta Da Morte - T01E26

programme.title: 2020. Na floresta da morte comea a segunda parte da Prova Chunin. Cada time recebe um tipo de pergaminho e deve roubar o outro tipo de outro time, chegando ao ponto final na torre com os dois pergaminhos. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte - T01E27

programme.title: 2020. A segunda parte da prova comea na floresta da morte. Sasuke nota que um inimigo se disfarou de Naruto. Sasuke salva e desamarra Naruto, e os trs membros criam uma senha para quando ficarem separados outra vez. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta
programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta - T01E28

programme.title: 2020. O ataque do ninja da Grama poderoso demais para Sasuke e Sakura. Sasuke pensa em entregar o pergaminho, mas Naruto o impede. A raiva de Naruto cresce e seus poderes so revelados. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!
programme.desc: Naruto: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda! - T01E29

programme.title: 2020. Ao ver Naruto lutar contra o ninja da Grama, Sasuke percebe que estava errado em fugir. Sasuke usa todo o potencial do seu Sharingan para afastar o ninja. Ele se apresenta como Orochimaru, some e deixa uma Marca da Maldio em Sasuke, que cai em dor. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago
programme.desc: Naruto: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago - T01E30

programme.title: 2020. Depois de ver a reportagem, Anko percebe um intruso na prova, Orochimaru, mas no consegue det-lo. Sakura, cansada e com medo, tenta impedir o inimigo. O autoproclamado demnio bonito da Aldeia da Folha, Rock Lee, aparece para o resgate! Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo
programme.desc: Naruto: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo - T01E31

programme.title: 2020. Protegendo Sakura, que no consegue mais se mover, Lee luta contra os trs ninja do Som. Ele usa sua habilidade secreta, mas ineficaz. Dosu o ataca, e Lee cai. Para proteger as pessoas que so importantes para ela, Sakura se levanta... Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce - T01E32

programme.title: 2020. Enquanto Sakura se defende dos ninjas do Som sozinha, o time rival Ino aparece! Depois de ver Sakura lutar contra os ninjas do Som, eles decidem ajud-la. Com a formao de batalha "Ino-Shika-Cho", o time Ino tenta deter os atacantes Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho - T01E33

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Caminho Das Camlias - T02E108
programme.desc: 2009. Os ninja da folha descobrem que naruto est dentro da besta de trs caudas. programme.desc: 2008. Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante... - T01E49
programme.desc: 2008. A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro? programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado - T01E50
programme.desc: 2008. Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro - T01E51
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha - T01E52
programme.desc: 2008. Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo - T01E53
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo - T02E54
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento - T02E55
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro - T02E56
programme.desc: 2008. Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno - T02E57
programme.desc: 2008. Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido - T02E58
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. programme.desc: When a divorced woman married to a verbally abusive husband is found murdered in her bed, all signs point to him until his alibi rules him out.

programme.title: The Wrong Daughter
programme.desc: When Danica, a child Kate gave up for adoption 17 years earlier, appears on Facebook, Kate invites her to come and live with her and her husband, but Danica has a secret. Starring Sydney Sweeney, April Bowlby, Cindy Busby.

programme.title: Staged Killer
programme.desc: A popular TV morning show hosts life begins to fall apart when a former co-anchor returns. Starring Chrishell Hartley, Nicole Bilderback, Jason Dolley.

programme.title: Raging Grace
programme.desc: Nothing is as it seems when an undocumented Filipina immigrant takes a job as a caretaker for a terminally ill man in a lavish home.
